description: Verify rejection when opening an account with an ID Number that already exists in the T-1 Setup State (Rule BR_ACC_OPEN_002). The rejection must return the existing Account ID.
source_rule_logic: If an account with the same ID Number already exists, the system must reject the opening request. The rejection record must contain: Status = '0' (Failure), Error Code = 'ID_EXISTS', and the Account ID of the *existing* account.
